timeline.message:
Config netty param in HttpServer

for #4224
Add three http param to control the netty behavior.

replies.bodyText: We'd better to provide some config for popular IDE
replies.author: imay

timeline.message:
Add to docs

Add  http_max_line_length and http_max_header_size to docs.
Because `maxChunkSize` is removed after Netty 5.X, we don't add http_max_chunk_size to docs.
